name: The Trial (P_Tipp)
description:
Waking up to an unfamiliar place, you must complete the trials before you to reveal the answer. But not all answer are pleasant....

The Trial is a 3D platformer game with a surprise 2D element, if you can find it. Go through the obstacle course and find out the truth of why you're here.

Warning! This game may cause motion sickness and make you nauseous. Do no play this game if you have epilepsy and the likes.
